action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Chemistry
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Three years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: PostDoc
OTHER-SKILLS: Research
AVAILABILITY: In two weeks

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Does the interviewer know what your bachelor's degree is? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: Yes.

ME:  Does the interviewer know what your highest education is? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: Yes.

ANSWER: Yes.

ANSWER: Yes.

ANSWER: Yes.

ASIDE: As a bachelor in chemistry, I learned the fundamental principles of chemistry, including the structure and behavior of matter, the laws of thermodynamics, and the principles of organic and inorganic chemistry. I also gained practical skills in laboratory techniques, data analysis
